com.bigdata.quorum

Class MockQuorumFixture.MockQuorum<S extends Remote,C extends QuorumMember<S>>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.bigdata.quorum.AbstractQuorum<S,C>
      • com.bigdata.quorum.MockQuorumFixture.MockQuorum<S,C>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Quorum<S,C>
    Enclosing class:
    MockQuorumFixture

    public static class MockQuorumFixture.MockQuorum<S extends Remote,C extends QuorumMember<S>>
extends AbstractQuorum<S,C>
    Mock Quorum implementation with increased visibility of some methods so we can pump state changes into the MockQuorumFixture2.
    Version:
    $Id: MockQuorumFixture.java 2984 2010-06-06 22:10:32Z thompsonbry $
    Author:
    Bryan Thompson

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      protected class  MockQuorumFixture.MockQuorum.MockQuorumActor
      Actor updates the state of the MockQuorumFixture2.
      protected class  MockQuorumFixture.MockQuorum.MockQuorumWatcher
      Watcher propagates state changes observed in the MockQuorumFixture2 to the MockQuorumFixture.MockQuorum.

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from class com.bigdata.quorum.AbstractQuorum

        Parameters:
        logicalServiceId - The identifier of the logical service corresponding to the highly available quorum.
        serviceId - The UUID of the service on whose behalf the actor will act.
        Returns:
        The QuorumActor which will effect changes in the distributed state of the quorum.

      • getActor

        public MockQuorumFixture.MockQuorum.MockQuorumActor getActor()
        Exposed to the unit tests which use the returned QuorumActor to send state change requests to the MockQuorumFixture2. From there, they are noticed by the MockQuorumFixture.MockQuorum.MockQuorumWatcher and become visible to the client's MockQuorumFixture.MockQuorum.
        Specified by:
        getActor in interface Quorum<S extends Remote,C extends QuorumMember<S>>
        Overrides:
        getActor in class AbstractQuorum<S extends Remote,C extends QuorumMember<S>>
        Returns:
        The QuorumActor which will effect changes in the distributed state of the quorum -or- null if the client is not a QuorumMember (only quorum members can take actions which effect the distributed quorum state).

      • start

        public void start(C client)
        Description copied from class: AbstractQuorum
        Begin asynchronous processing. The state of the quorum is reset, the client is registered as a QuorumListener, the QuorumActor and QuorumWatcher are created, and asynchronous discovery is initialized for the QuorumWatcher.
        Specified by:
        start in interface Quorum<S extends Remote,C extends QuorumMember<S>>
        Overrides:
        start in class AbstractQuorum<S extends Remote,C extends QuorumMember<S>>

      • terminate

        Description copied from interface: Quorum
